resources.string:
Please follow the below steps properly:


	1:Register Your Phone Number.
	2:Register Your Guardian Numbers.
	3:Always maintain working internet connection.
	4:SHOUT the word "HELP" in case of emergency to alert your guardians.
Please grant the permission to use the microphone
Please allow Speech to always run in the background,else our services can\'t be accessed when you are in distress
